title: Chirin no Suzu (Ringing Bell) (1987) [Dual Audio]
description:
Ringing Bell ( Chirin no Suzu=Chirin's Bell) is the 1978 Japanese/American anime film adaption of the book of the same name written by Takashi Yanase. It is most notable by fans and critics as a G-rated children's film which makes a sharp-sudden turn into a dark and violent story. It is also recognized as one of the only Japanese shock films directed towards children. It was banned in most countries while some countries give it a restricted rating.

========================================================
